name: lunch-alegra-monorepo
description: Monorepo para el proyecto Lunch Alegra - Microservicios y Frontend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:microservices && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev:microservices: npm run dev:infra && cd microservices && pnpm -w install && pnpm install && pnpm run build:shared && pnpm -F inventory-svc run migrate
scripts.prod:restart: npm run prod:down && npm run prod:up
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker system prune -a -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.build:all: npm run build:microservices && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:microservices && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:microservices && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:microservices && npm run clean:frontend

author: Victor Alvarez
